00009 Obstacles::Obstacles(string fichierObstacles,Trace * t)
00010 {
00011   trace = t;
00012   src = "obstacles.cpp";
00013   cl = "Obstacles";
00014   message = "debut";
00015   trace->print(src,cl,"Obstacles",message);
00016   TiXmlDocument doc( fichierObstacles );
00017   if(!doc.LoadFile())
00018   {
00019     message = "Problème doc.LoadFile() "+ fichierObstacles;
00020     trace->print(src,cl,"Obstacles",message);
00021     exit(1);   
00022   }
00023   else
00024   {
00025     if(!chargerXML(doc))
00026     {
00027       message = "Problème après appel chargerXML ";
00028       trace->print(src,cl,"Obstacles",message);
00029       exit(1);
00030     }
00031   }
00032   message = "fin";
00033   trace->print(src,cl,"Obstacles",message);
00034 }
00035 
00036 Obstacles::~Obstacles(void)
00037 {
00038   message = "debut";
00039   trace->print(src,cl,"~Obstacles",message);
00040   vectorSegment2D::iterator it;
00041   for (it = tabSegments.begin();it!=tabSegments.end();++it)
00042   {
00043     delete(*it);
00044   }
00045   message = "fin";
00046   trace->print(src,cl,"~Obstacles",message);
00047 }
00048 
00049 int Obstacles::chargerXML(TiXmlDocument & doc)
00050 {
00051   message = "debut";
00052   trace->print(src,cl,"chargerXML",message);
00053   TiXmlHandle docHandle( &doc );
00054   
00055   //chargement des segments
00056   TiXmlElement* pSeg = docHandle.FirstChildElement("Segment2D").Element();
00057   for( pSeg; pSeg; pSeg=pSeg->NextSiblingElement("Segment2D"))
00058   {
00059     Segment2D * s2D = new Segment2D(pSeg);
00060     message = "segment";
00061     trace->print(src,cl,"chargerXML",message);
00062     tabSegments.push_back(s2D);
00063   }
00064   message = "debut";
00065   trace->print(src,cl,"chargerXML",message);
00066   return 1;
00067 }
